item.title: Hotels.com provides exclusive information on transportation options to and from the airport
item.description: Hotels.com, a website for booking accommodations online, has put together an insider’s guide on the top transportation choices from 29 major airports globally. This guide, called the Hotels.com Airport Transportation Insider, compares taxis, private cars, and public transportation in popular international and domestic destinations using data from the recent Hotel Price Indexâ„¢. Although it’s geared towards US travelers, the infographic provides helpful information for cities like Bangkok, Beijing, Singapore, and Sydney.
